system.description:
Class: @UUID[Compendium.projectfu.classes.kVSzbabb2AUviwnH]{Weaponmaster}

A lifetime of training and aptitude all leading to a single moment of test.

Qualities

  1. When you perform a @UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.XhcTVGtGEk7L2Ddq]{Counterattack} if the result of the accuracy check was a fumble you make your free attack at full potency.

  2. When you take the @EFFECT[guard] action you can perform a @UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.XhcTVGtGEk7L2Ddq]{Counterattack} even if the result of the failed accuracy check was not an even number.
